mechanics.trigger: Melee Attack Roll with affected weapon
mechanics.condition: Spell is active AND Using a club or quarterstaff affected by Shillelagh
mechanics.outcome: Use caster's spellcasting ability modifier instead of Strength modifier for attack roll

mechanics.trigger: Melee Damage Roll with affected weapon
mechanics.condition: Spell is active AND Using a club or quarterstaff affected by Shillelagh
mechanics.outcome: Use caster's spellcasting ability modifier instead of Strength modifier for damage roll

mechanics.trigger: Melee Damage Roll with affected weapon
mechanics.condition: Spell is active AND Using a club or quarterstaff affected by Shillelagh
mechanics.outcome: Weapon's damage die becomes a d8

mechanics.trigger: Spell is cast on a club or quarterstaff
mechanics.outcome: Weapon becomes magical for the spell's duration

mechanics.condition: A previous Shillelagh spell is active

mechanics.trigger: Caster lets go of the affected weapon
mechanics.condition: Shillelagh spell is active on the weapon

description_text: The wood of a club or a quarterstaff you are holding is imbued with nature's power. For the duration, you can use your spellcasting ability instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of melee attacks using that weapon, and the weapon's damage die becomes a d8. The weapon also becomes magical, if it isn't already. The spell ends if you cast it again or if you let go of the weapon.
